name: The Last Ghost
description:
You're playing as a ninja who wants to get his revenge for his family who have been killed by a great warlord; In order for him to do that he has to take the 3 flags across the forest.

Controls:

W/A/S/D to move or Arrow UP/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT to move.

Left Click to fire, Ctrl to crouch, Space to jump, E to interact with items.
